pr_title: A bunch of new stuff for codestarts

timeline.bodyText: If you're merging them, it would be nice to use a LinkedHashSet instead
timeline.author: gastaldi

timeline.message: Add Kotlin for qute and commandmode codestarts
A bunch of new stuff for codestarts

timeline.bodyText: Why not use the primitive boolean here instead?
timeline.author: gastaldi

replies.bodyText: If default value is false, we could..
replies.author: ia3andy

timeline.bodyText: Not sure I like renaming this, it's confusing compared to the original setting
timeline.author: gastaldi

replies.bodyText: Since default is with example, IMO it makes more sense to say withoutExampleCode when you don't want it.
replies.author: ia3andy

replies.bodyText: Then IMHO it's more natural to say something like -DgenerateExample=false
replies.author: gastaldi

replies.bodyText: I think my favorite is skipExample :)
replies.author: maxandersen

replies.bodyText: I'll go with skipExample using primitives
replies.author: ia3andy
